Romanians, Bulgarians to fly, sail passport-free to EU from end-March 2024Citizens of European Union members Romania and Bulgaria will no longer need a passport from March 31, 2024 to travel by air or sea to most other EU countries as well as Norway and Switzerland, the council of EU governments said on Saturday. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 23:19:17 GMT E6ZFLDJ4O5I47AOMEYMQ2X5FQE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/romanians-bulgarians-fly-sail-passport-free-eu-end-march-2024-2023-12-30/Reuters世界欧洲
North Korea plans for three more reconnaissance satellites as it sets policy goalsNorth Korea says policy goals for next year includes launching three additional military reconnaissance satellites and building unmanned aerial vehicles to advance North Korea's military, state media KCNA reported on Sunday. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 22:58:50 GMT FA2XDRIUXJMUBNUAGVLJNI425Y https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-korea-plans-launch- Three-more-reconnaissance-satellites-2024-kcna-reports-2023-12-30/Reuters世界亚太地区
Massive waves on California coast cause flooding, force evacuationsCoastal communities in California faced another day of towering waves and possible flooding on Saturday as officials issued evacuation orders in some areas and warned residents to stay off beaches and coastal roadways. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 21:54:43 GMT KADMCP5P4VO3TMZ4SPN4G3HQY4 https://www.reuters.com/world/us/massive-waves-california-coast-cause-flooding-force-evacuations-2023-12-30/Reuters世界美国
UK Maritime Trade Operations receives report of incident near Yemen's HodeidahUnited Kingdom Maritime Trade Operations (UKMTO) on Saturday received a report of an incident approximately 55 nautical miles (nM) south west of Yemen's Hodeidah port where "the master reported a loud bang and a flash on the port bow of the vessel." Sat, 30 Dec 2023 21:33:48 GMT HEQVCE2BMNLQZE5QXOBAPVDX5I https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/ukmto-receives-report-incident-near-yemens-hodeidah-advisory-note-2023-12-30/Reuters世界中东
US urges appeals court to reject Trump immunity claim in 2020 election caseU.S. prosecutors on Saturday urged a federal appeals court to reject former President Donald Trump’s claim that he cannot face criminal charges for seeking to overturn his defeat in the 2020 election. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 20:15:24 GMT M4ABJCCFJNPDJEGO3UYOJXRZHA https://www.reuters.com/legal/us-urges-appeals-court-reject-trump-immunity-claim-2020-election-case-2023-12-30/Andrew Goudsward合法的
Netanyahu says Israel should control Gaza-Egypt border zoneThe border zone between the Gaza Strip and Egypt should be under Israel's control, Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said on Saturday as he predicted the war in the Palestinian enclave and on other regional fronts would last many more months. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 19:40:47 GMT RT5LWNHLTNN7TI7QNBDZ3JKJLU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/netanyahu-says-gaza-egypt-border-zone-should-be-under-israeli-control-2023-12-30/Reuters世界中东
Russia strikes civilian targets in Kharkiv, at least 8 woundedTwin Russian missile strikes on central Kharkiv on Saturday injured at least 21 people, Ukrainian officials said. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 18:28:10 GMT CH3MRVEIO5MMLDKV3FZ5I7AUGA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-strikes-civilian-targets-kharkiv-least-8-wounded-officials-2023-12-30/Reuters世界欧洲
Israeli ex-hostage says she feared being raped by Gaza captorAn Israeli-French woman who was among scores of people taken hostage by Hamas militants has described how she feared being raped by the gunman who watched over her around the clock in the home where he lived with his wife and children in Gaza. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 18:21:16 GMT 5B7YSY2BFJMZ5BQRK7N4CTJBOY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-ex-hostage-says-she-feared-being-raped-by-gaza-captor-2023-12-30/Reuters世界中东
Nicaragua arrests four more priests, intensifies crackdown on Catholic ChurchNicaraguan police detained four more priests early on Saturday, bringing the total number to 12 over the past three days, according to a high-ranking member of the Catholic Church with knowledge of the matter and local media. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 18:13:46 GMT AEVI6BZLTJJLBAM26KZTT3L4QU https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/nicaragua-arrests-four-more-priests-intensizes-crackdown-catholic-church-2023-12-30/Ismael Lopez世界美洲
Burundi's president says gay people should be stonedBurundi's President Evariste Ndayishimiye has called on citizens to stone gay people, escalating a crackdown on sexual minorities in a country where LGBT people already face social ostracism and jail terms of up to two years if convicted of same-sex offences. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 17:35:27 GMT 6MCN44P4CROXFFXEEGDPCYYTHM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/burundis-president-says-gay-people-should-be-stoned-2023-12-30/Reuters世界非洲
Palestinian group says captive Israeli soldier killed in Gaza by Israeli air strikeThe armed wing of the Popular Front for the Liberation of Palestine said on Saturday that an Israeli soldier being held captive by the group in Gaza had been killed in an Israeli air strike that had also wounded some of his captors. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 17:25:41 GMT 73JGPZLXPJNCRHLFEQJZ5EA5S4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/palestinian-group-says-captive-israeli-soldier-killed-gaza-by-israeli-air-strike-2023-12-30/Reuters世界中东
